General.Name: FnGuide Inc.
General.Description: FnGuide Inc. provides financial information services. The company offers data and solutions for financial professionals, including DataGuide, a financial market data analysis system; QuantiWise, a company/investment analysis system; FnSpectrum, a fund data retrieval system; and FnFive, a debt securities analysis system. It also provides index, company information, solution, and support services. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
